project.name: Bronto
project.description: The native concentrated liquidity layer of MegaETH
project.longDescription: Bronto Finance is the first real-time metaDEX on MegaETH, offering a seamless trading experience with dynamic fees, protection against impermanent loss and JIT liquidity risks, all powered by the ve(3,3) model.

features.title: Concentrated Liquidity Pools
features.description: Custom pools inspired by Uniswap v3 and Solidly, optimized for low slippage, high capital efficiency, and protection against impermanent loss and JIT attacks.

features.title: ve(3,3) Governance
features.description: Lock tokens for voting power, direct emissions, and earn trading fees and protocol rewards

features.title: Dynamic Fees
features.description: Real-time fee adjustments based on volatility and volume to boost LP profitability and improve trade execution.

features.title: Ultra-Fast Trading
features.description: Powered by MegaETH for lightning-fast trades, seamless execution, and intuitive features like one-click rebalancing.

features.title: Permissionless Market Creation
features.description: Anyone can launch new trading pairs and liquidity pools that are open, fast, and fully decentralized.

project.currentStatus: Swap, voting, liquidity adding/removal, and one-step rebalancer are live, with dynamic fees and impermanent loss protection coming soon.

steps.title: About Swapping
steps.content: Bronto Finance offers real-time trade settlement and intuitive trading charts to make data-backed decisions, with customizable slippage and transaction deadlines for a personalized trading experience.

steps.title: Try it yourself
steps.content:
1. Connect Your Wallet: Visit Bronto Finance, click "Connect Wallet", and select your preferred wallet (e.g., MetaMask).

2.Select Tokens: Choose the tokens you want to swap in the dropdown menus.

3.Set Amount & Customize: Enter the amount, adjust slippage tolerance, set transaction deadlines or use defaults, and review trade details.

4. Execute Swap: Click "Swap" and confirm the transaction in your wallet.

steps.title: About Liquidity
steps.content: Bronto Finance lets you manage liquidity and positions with real-time updates

steps.title: Try it yourself
steps.content:
1. Navigate to pools tab and select a liquidity pool to provide the liquidity to.

2. Add Liquidity: Use default settings for a quick deposit or switch to Pro Mode to customize price or tick ranges, fee tiers, and track key details.

3. Track Positions: Head to the Positions tab to monitor your LPs, view earnings, and check if any are out of range.

4. Rebalance in One Step: Use the One-Step Rebalancer to automatically withdraw, update ranges, and redeposit your liquidityâ€”all in a single transaction.

steps.title: About Locking
steps.content: Bronto Finance lets you lock tokens for up to 4 years, gaining time-based voting power to influence pool rewards and protocol direction.

steps.title: Try it yourself
steps.content:
1. Choose amount & Lock Period: Select how many tokens to lock and set a duration (up to 4 years),  longer locks grant more voting power.

2. Lock Tokens: Confirm the lock in your wallet to receive time-weighted voting power.

3. Vote on Pools: Use your voting power to support pools you believe in and help direct future emissions.

steps.title: Try it yourself
steps.content:
1. Allocate Votes: Distribute your veBRONTO voting power to the pools you wish to support. Your votes influence the allocation of emissions and can attract more liquidity to those pools.

2. Earn Rewards: By voting, you earn a share of trading fees and any additional incentives attached to the pools you've supported.

3. Review Emission Schedule: Stay informed about the emissions schedule and phases by visiting the Weekly Emission Schedule
